prod_descrip: Hand-woven earth-friendly sisal grasscloth wallcovering - sustainable and biodegradable
prod_specs:
MATERIAL: SISAL GRASSCLOTH WITH PAPER BACKING

36" WIDE

PACKED IN 8 YARD ROLLS

8 YARD MINIMUM PURCHASE

HAND-WOVEN

COLORED WITH WATER-BASED VEGETABLE DYES

ASTM-E84 CLASS A
prod_t_1:
Sisal is a type of Agave plant that yields a stiff fibre that is harvested and hand-woven to create our Sisal Grasscloth wallcovering.

The lustrous, natural wallcovering is earth-friendly throughout all phases of its life cycle - harvested from a sustainable crop of renewable fibers, air dried in the sun before being colored with water-based vegetable dyes and hand-woven. The sisal is backed with chemical free Scandinavian papers and is VOC free and even biodegradable. This earth-friendly profile does not diminish its suitability for commercial applications, as all of the wallcoverings are ATME-84 fire rated and highly durable.
prod_t_2: download PDF
prod_t_4: colors: reed, skylight and haze - Interior Design Magazine
prod_t_6:
Our grasscloth is extremely durable and is well-suited for both residential applications and higher traffic areas. It is ASTM-E84 fire rated for commercial applications.

The material can be vacuumed to release any dust that may accumulate on the surface. Do not use water to clean the grasscloth wallcovering, as the natural vegetable dyes used to create the colors can bleed or streak.
prod_t_7:
INSTOCK ITEMS
Your order will ship within 1-2 business days if your item is in stock. The ship date may vary based upon availability of each item.

NOT IN STOCK ITEMS
The lead time for any product will be listed right above the price when you are viewing a specific product.

MEMO SAMPLES
Memo sample orders are shipped via the US Postal Service unless otherwise specified during checkout.

RETURNS
As our products are made by hand and are manufactured and sold from specific dye lots, we cannot accept returns. We strongly suggest ordering memo samples to review the color and quality in person before ordering. Once you receive your order, please carefully inspect your product to ensure that it is in good condition and in the quantity you ordered.
